# `OutboundDomainCreateRequest` Definition

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| id | `string` | Yes | Unique Id of the domain such as: example.com |
| senderType | `string` | No | Sender Type |
| emailSetting | [`EmailSettingReference`](emailsettingreference-definition.md) | No | The email settings to associate with this domain. |
| name | `string` | Yes | The domain such as: example.com |
